author: mmusich
body:
This update is necessary after the merge of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49715.
See https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49715#issuecomment-3722939573 for a rationale.
To be tested together with the companion `cmssw` PR:
title: upgrade the `streamDQMOnlineScouting` input files following the update of the `Run3ScoutingHBHERecHit` data-format
